DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the use of a mobile sensing platform in a primary care setting has an effect on provider workflows, patient outcomes, patient engagement, patient self-help behavior, health research, and total cost of care.
DOC.brief_title: Dashboards for Clinician Monitoring of Patients Through a Mobile Sensing Platform
DOC.criteria: Be between 18 and 70 years of age. Speak, understand, and read conversational English. Be a current patient of South Huntington Clinic recommended for behavioral health care. Have a smartphone and cell service plan, including voice and data, that meets the device requirements of the Mobile Sensing Platform. Planning on permanently leaving Boston during the study period.
